description: [QakBot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0650) can deobfuscate and re-assemble code strings for execution.(Citation: Cyberint Qakbot May 2021)(Citation: ATT QakBot April 2021)(Citation: Kaspersky QakBot September 2021)

external_references.description: Cyberint. (2021, May 25). Qakbot Banking Trojan. Retrieved September 27, 2021.
Morrow, D. (2021, April 15). The rise of QakBot. Retrieved September 27, 2021.
Kuzmenko, A. et al. (2021, September 2). QakBot technical analysis. Retrieved September 27, 2021.
